message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's in great condition and worth every penny. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $140 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $160, which is still a good deal for you considering the value of the product. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking $155 would be a fair price. Can you meet me at this price?
